text: Art Agenda's new salon at Tanjong Pagar Distripark! Creative modern curating space which I attended Art & Market's AMSR and loved it. üòÅ looking forward to many impactful exhibitions. Highly recommend to visit if you are an art enthusiast!

Had a workshop on introduction to Southeast Asia art and the team was patient and knowledgeable!

Takes some finding to reach the gallery but well worth the time!

Just above Singapore Art Museum so great to learn and put it to the test at SAM!

Attended a workshop with Art Agenda.. it is a very insightful event and gained valuable knowledge about art appreciation!

The people there are industry veterans which adds credibility to things they do
Really enjoyed the workshop with Art Agenda, it is very professional and a rare opportunity to come up close and personal with treasured works of art
